summary: This appears to be a calendar entry or scheduling document for a proceeding in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, scheduled for November 22-23, 2021, to be held via Zoom. It lists Allison Stoddart as an attendee.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, which is the subject of this scheduling document.

persons.name: Allison Stoddart
persons.context: Listed as an attendee for the scheduled Zoom meeting related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

connections.description: Stoddart is listed as an attendee for a court proceeding in Maxwell's criminal case.

events.title: Scheduled Court Proceeding for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A proceeding in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell is scheduled to begin via Zoom.

keyFacts: A court proceeding for Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled for November 22-23, 2021.
The proceeding was to be conducted remotely via Zoom.
Allison Stoddart is listed as an attendee for this proceeding.
